# GitHub Templates and Workflows

This directory contains GitHub-specific files for the QuaiMiner Core project.

## Contents

- **ISSUE_TEMPLATE/** - Templates for bug reports and feature requests
- **PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md** - Template for pull requests
- **FUNDING.yml** - Sponsorship configuration

## Usage

These templates help maintain consistency and provide structure for:
- Bug reports
- Feature requests
- Pull requests

They are automatically used when creating new issues or pull requests on GitHub.
